metadata.title: BOOST Mango Lassi Delight: Only 5 Ingredients

text: BOOST Vanilla Simply+ Mango Lassi is a refreshing and nourishing delight made with just five ingredients. Not only is this quick and easy to make but it is also packed with goodness that will leave you feeling satisfied. The combination of the smooth vanilla flavour and the natural sweetness of mangoes creates a harmonious blend. For added richness, sprinkle crushed pistachios, dried rose petals or saffron strands on top.
¼ teaspoon each: Ground cardamom (Elaichi powder), Kewra essence (optional)
Place all the ingredients into the blender, including Kewra essence and ice (if using) and blend until smooth.
Use Boost Just Protein powder if desired.
Sprinkle crushed pistachios, dried rose petals or saffron strands over top of lassi.
Fold in 1 cup of finely chopped fresh mango after blending lassi.
